author: tomdz
msg: Changes to the to the dbhandling task:
* Fixed nasty little ant classloader problem which resulted in classnotfound exceptions for all OJB classes
* Added attributes for specifying the locations of OJB.properties file and repository.xml

* Added OJB initialization code to handle the common situation that the task is executed in a directoy other than the one where the OJB.properties file is which leads to problems when searching for the repository.xml
